title: FBNBank Ghana launches 'You First' campaign
text:
16 July 2015 11:00 CET FBNBank Ghana launches 'You First' campaign By GNA 
Accra, July 15, GNA - FBNBank Ghana has launched its corporate advertising campaign tailored to put the customer at the heart of its business operations. 
The launch highlights the Bank's commitment to becoming the leader in the country's financial sector. 
Mr Enoch Vanderpuye, Country Team Lead, Marketing and Corporate Communications, FBNBank Ghana, said with the 'You First' value proposition, the corporate entity has established itself as a partner to its customers, providing relevant solutions to all their banking needs as their lives continue to evolve. 
It said the Bank emerged from an enviably rich heritage and banking tradition, which has shaped its business to become the leader across several markets in Africa and beyond. 
'The Bank's footprints are visible across the world in Abu Dhabi, Beijing, DR Congo, Ghana, Guinea, Johannesburg, London, Nigeria, Paris, Senegal, Sierra Leone, and The Gambia,' it said. 
Mr Seyi Oyefeso, Managing Director and Chief Executive Officer of FBNBank Ghana Limited, said the 'FBNBank Ghana takes pride in being exclusively customer-centric and we go to great lengths to put 'You First.' 
He said the Bank's 'You First' declaration simply implied that at the Bank, they put their stakeholders at the heart of their business. 
Mr Oyefeso said that the Bank's financial services knowledge and practices has made it a leader in the market - ensuring a better understanding of customers to strive for a better way of delivering first-class service and experience. 
'Today, we deepen our application of this culture in the Ghanaian market, even as we provide unrivalled value to all our customers,' he added. 
GNA
